channel.title: Glitches Problem
channel.description: Hi i went on my economy server this morning and this guy came on and had all partyhats and h'ween masks and i was wondering if someone can help me patch them. he didnt say what the glitch was so i ip banned him for doing glitches.

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Exussit:

cheat engine doesn’t work on runescape nor private servers; cheat engine can only modify client sided things like sprites and other framework but it’s impossible to physically change the character data just by modifying on the client side as it’s server sided.

But you could change that packet data being sent, and if the server doesn’t have sufficient input validation, you could do adverse things.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @Exussit Exussit
item.description:

cheat engine doesn’t work on runescape nor private servers; cheat engine can only modify client sided things like sprites and other framework but it’s impossible to physically change the character data just by modifying on the client side as it’s server sided.

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:9, topic:392252”]There are 3 scenarios of how this could have this could have happened:

  1. Maybe the user has a cheat client that is not blocked by your source.
  2. One of your staff members gave him them.
  3. Maybe it was one of your staff members that just made a new account and transferred stuff to the account.[/quote]
    Ok how would i block cheat engine and the last 2 options are impossible because when your staff and drop the item it disappears and staff cannot trade on my server at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

There are 3 scenarios of how this could have this could have happened:

  1. Maybe the user has a cheat client that is not blocked by your source.
  2. One of your staff members gave him them.
  3. Maybe it was one of your staff members that just made a new account and transferred stuff to the account.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

spidermat1:

I Think he used the cheat engine glitch first of all u gotta fix this a person puts there curser on the item then types in the id second he does another item then does another scan with the next scan item code then 5-6 things come up u change em to the phat or mask code and u can freeze the numbers then buy tons of phats and masks hope this helps

How would i fix cheat engine or block cheat engine from working on my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

zyle1992:

When people realize that no one should have the ability to spawn items, and that there should ALWAYS be input validation.

Read full topic

I Think he used the cheat engine glitch first of all u gotta fix this a person puts there curser on the item then types in the id second he does another item then does another scan with the next scan item code then 5-6 things come up u change em to the phat or mask code and u can freeze the numbers then buy tons of phats and masks hope this helps

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you cant always trust your staff… if you never gave them away and your staff never gave the items away then its not possible for this person to have started dupeing the items to get lots of them.

i dont know, you should un-ban him and see what he does.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches Problem
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

kickingjamie:

most probably he found a shop or something that gives out rares that you didnt know about so i would look for that first, then i would check all your commands give the right items to the right people. you could also ask your staff or anyone that could give items away.

i checked my shops and it didnt have any party hats in them and i checked my commands and stuff for non-players and theres nothing and i checked with the staff and they havent gave any away so i dont know whats going on.

Read full topic
